Uses of Class
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.introspect.POJOPropertiesCollector

  • Packages that use POJOPropertiesCollector 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.introspect
    Functionality needed for Bean introspection, required for detecting accessors and mutators for Beans, as well as locating and handling method annotations.

    • Uses of POJOPropertiesCollector in com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.introspect

      Methods in com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.introspect that return POJOPropertiesCollector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      POJOPropertiesCollector POJOPropertiesCollector.collect()
      Method that orchestrates collection activities, and needs to be called after creating the instance.
      protected POJOPropertiesCollector BasicClassIntrospector.collectProperties(MapperConfig<?> config, JavaType type, ClassIntrospector.MixInResolver r, boolean forSerialization, String mutatorPrefix) 
      protected POJOPropertiesCollector BasicClassIntrospector.collectPropertiesWithBuilder(MapperConfig<?> config, JavaType type, ClassIntrospector.MixInResolver r, boolean forSerialization) 
      protected POJOPropertiesCollector BasicClassIntrospector.constructPropertyCollector(MapperConfig<?> config, AnnotatedClass ac, JavaType type, boolean forSerialization, String mutatorPrefix)
      Overridable method called for creating POJOPropertiesCollector instance to use; override is needed if a custom sub-class is to be used.
      Methods in com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.introspect with parameters of type POJOPropertiesCollector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BasicBeanDescription BasicBeanDescription.forDeserialization(POJOPropertiesCollector coll)
      Factory method to use for constructing an instance to use for building deserializers.
      static BasicBeanDescription BasicBeanDescription.forSerialization(POJOPropertiesCollector coll)
      Factory method to use for constructing an instance to use for building serializers.
